page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: We, the children of Classes 6g & 6w of the Bliss Charity Aided School, would like to express our thanks to all those people, both in and outside the village who gave of their time in helping us compile our information. Everyone in these two classes took part but the following actually provided the work chosen:- James Allen, Abigail Brien, Kelly Carnague, Alan Crawley, Emma England, Matthew Farmer, Simon Felton, Nicola Galt, Wendy Hayward, Zoe Highfield, Mark Hill, Samantha King, Daniel Musson, Christopher Noton, Darren Parris, Julia Raven, Lorraine Tatman, Tracy Tutchener, Russell Walker, James Wallis, Christine Wood, Kate Wright. We, the children of 6g & 6w, all wish to dedicate our work to the memory of our friend and classmate {DARREN MARK POWELL} who died on August 9th 1985 following a traffic accident.
